front.title: Huawei Port Range Configuration Options for PPP IP Control Protocol (IPCP)
front.abstract: This document defines two Huawei IPCP (IP Control Protocol) options used to convey a set of ports. These options can be used in the context of port range-based solutions or NAT-based solutions for port delegation and forwarding purposes. This document is not an Internet Standards Track specification; it is published for informational purposes.
